The country innocence, or, The chamber-maid turn'd Quaker a comedy : with alterations and amendments as it is now acted at the Theatre-Royal / written by John Leanerd. Leanerd, John, fl. 1679.
[8], 57, [2] p.
Printed for Charles Harper ..., London : 1677.
"The covntrie girle by T.B.", generally ascribed to Antony Brewer published under a new title with alterations by John Leanerd. This work appears at reel 604:11 as Wing L795, and at reel 935:16 as Wing C6535 (number cancelled). Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[8], 57, [2] p.
Printed for Charles Harper ..., London : 1677.
"The covntrie girle by T.B.", generally ascribed to Antony Brewer published under a new title with alterations by John Leanerd. This work appears at reel 604:11 as Wing L795, and at reel 935:16 as Wing C6535 (number cancelled). Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
